name: Shunned
description:
One unfortunate night and the mysterious mission gone wrong - "Shunned" follows the main protagonist, SGT. (Sergeant) Allen, who gets in trouble and has to find a way out, while trying to survive and contain his sanity in check. Will you follow along and help him to get out of this crazy situation? If yes, then play and find out the truth. 

The game is not long, depending on your skill and attention to little details. This project includes:
1. Atmospheric, body and monster horror. 
2. Puzzles. 
3. Combat
4. Unusual Twist Ending. 

It took me 3 weeks to finish this game. It was a lot of work, especially with puzzles and I hope everyone enjoys the experience. Please, if you can, leave a feedback, suggestion or bug report comments down below. Thanks for checking out the game.
